page.title: 03ADULT TRAINING CENTRE
page.content: THE ADULT TRAINING CENTRE IS FOR MENTALLY HANDICAPPED PEOPLE AND WAS OPENED IN OCTOBER 1961. BETWEEN 70 AND 90 PEOPLE STAY THERE FROM 9.15AM TO 4.15PM MONDAY TO FRIDAY. MEMBERS AGES RANGE FROM 19 TO 58 AT PRESENT. THE PEOPLE COME FROM FORMBY AND SOUTHPORT. THEY USUALLY ATTEND FOR 5 DAYS A WEEK. THE SOCIAL WORKER ADVISES PEOPLE TO GO. THE STAFF ICLUDES A MANAGER, A DEPUTY, 7 INSTRUCTORS AND A CARE ASSISTANT. THEY ARE TAUGHT HOW TO GO SHOPPING AND HAVE TRIPS TO MUSEUMS, ZOOS AND OTHER ENTERTAINMENTS, WHICH ARE FUNDED BY THE DAY HOSTEL IN SOUTHPORT. THERE ARE SEVERAL SPECIAL ROOMS INCLUDING A FURTHER EDUCATION AND SPECIAL CARE ROOM.
